up:: [[Thinking MOC]] tags:: #on/thinking Fluid Thinking Being able to think fluidly gives you the awareness and skill to think from the right level of abstraction at the right time.

If you’re looking at this note, I’m just trying to show you in 20 seconds how rigid Folgezettel is. Instead, you can get all the benefits without all the negatives by using higher order notes like MOCs to build completely fluid, non-rigid structures.
But also how it doesn’t work easily [[Folgezettel - 100a.1b Adds certain things…]]
Because when you add certain things [[Folgezettel - 100a.2 Adds Upfront Friction]]
You have A LOT of upfront deliberations figuring out where exactly it’s supposed to fit. Some thinking is great, but not THIS MUCH.
And over time, it becomes quite rigid. Return to [[LYT Kit]].
